message.txOut: This address does not have outgoing transactions

charts.title: Transactions (Last 10 blocks)
charts.liveDescription: Number of successful, failed, and pending transactions that have occured in the last 10 blocks
charts.avgDescription: Average transaction fees and average gas price in the last 10 blocks

about.title: What is EthVM?
about.text: EthVM project is brought to you by kvhnuke,  founder of MyEtherWallet and enKrypt. EthVM is a free and open source interface for exploring and evaluting real time Ethereum blocks, transactions and more. This software is under MIT License.
about.git: If you want to contribute, make a request on GitHub.
about.medium: If you want to listen/share our awesome thoughts check our medium account.
